item.description:
Protest winter in your Hawaiian shirt and board shorts.

This marks the release of a limited edition CD-R from Megalife compiling all their internet tracks with rare others (including the music to Zac's "death sounds" video).

For more information on the bands, check out the links:

BLACK CHURCHES -http://blackchurches....

MEGALIFE -http://www.megalife.b...

BEAGLE BONE - http://www.myspace.co...

LADYBUST - http://www.youtube.co...

BLOOD LUNG

Directions - http://www.paslounge....

I will meet everyone outside the entrance of PA's Lounge. I will send out my cell phone number the day before the event.
item.name: Black Churches - February Beach Theme Night at PA's Lounge!
